title: Bitcoin (BTC) Consolidating Before the Next Leg Higher or Running Out of Steam?
author: Nick Cawley
description: Bitcoin is nudging lower in early turnover after rallying in excess of $1,000 in the last week. If support holds then Bitcoin may look at highs seen in June last year.

title: Chainlink Up Nearly 1,000% Since ‘Black Thursday’ Crash
author: Paddy Bake
description: Chainlink's LINK token has surged nearly 1,000% over the past five months – some are worried the market is beginning to overheat.

title: Here’s Why Analysts Are So Optimistic About Litecoin After 20% Breakout
author: Nick Chong
description: While the focus of crypto investors has been on Bitcoin and Ethereum over recent days, Litecoin’s recent price performance has come into the public spotlight. From last week’s lows of approximately $55, the asset has surged just over 20% to $67 as of this art.

title: Bitcoin SV payment processor Centi closes funding round headlined by Dr. Jürg Conzett & Calvin Ayre
author: sharmarajrocks803
description: ZURICH, Aug. 18, 2020 /PRNewswire/ -- Centi, the Switzerland-based Bitcoin SV payments processor, today announces that it has closed its first funding round headlined by Dr. Jürg Conzett, founder of Zurich's MoneyMuseum & technology entrepreneur Calvin Ayre.

title: Twitter Hack—Old Dog, New Tricks
author: www.ITSecurityNews.info
description: Read the original article: Twitter Hack—Old Dog, New Tricks The recent Twitter breach involving Bitcoin transfer scams is not a new concept. SlashNext’s Threat Lab sees dozens of phishing sites each day because cybercriminals see it as an easy way to make mon.

title: Satoshi Nakaboto: ‘Bitcoin ends day above $12K for first time in a year’
author: Satoshi Nakaboto
description: Our robot colleague Satoshi Nakaboto writes about Bitcoin every fucking day. Welcome to another edition of Bitcoin Today, where I, Satoshi Nakaboto, tell you what’s been going on with Bitcoin in the past 24 hours. As Hegel used to say: Yippee! Bitcoin price.

title: Weekly Bitcoin and Cryptocurrency Market Analysis
author: Bitcoinist
description: Simon Peters, market analyst: Bitcoin Teases Us At $12,000  Suffice it to say, it was a busy week, with mixed performance in equity markets and odd – but not unpromising – movements for bitcoin. The FTSE All-Share index and the STOXX600 both recorded steady

title: Uniswap - the DeFi goldmine minting overnight (and daily) Crypto Millionaires
author: Crypto AM: Definitively DeFi
description: UniSwap is a name you should know about if you are planning to get in on the current DeFi craze\nThe post Uniswap - the DeFi goldmine minting overnight (and daily) Crypto Millionaires appeared first on CityAM.
